description.value:
As an action, you gather winds around you and shoot forward 30 feet in a straight line, phasing through any creatures that would otherwise block you, and creating a small wind tunnel 15 feet past where you stopped. All creatures you phased through must succeed on a Dexterity (Save) check or take 1d6 slashing damage as a sharp wind cuts into them. This damage increases by 1d6 per growth level. 
When trying to move through a solid object, construct, or creature of a larger size or wearing weighty armor, you slam into it instead, taking 2d6 bludgeoning damage from the collision and dealing the same to the collision point or target.
This trait can only be used once per rest.
